first_para: Sir Peter James Luff (born 18 February 1955) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Mid Worcestershire from the 1997 general election to March 2015, and was MP for Worcester from 1992 until 1997. He was a Defence minister from 2010-2012.

full.extract: Sir Peter James Luff (born 18 February 1955) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Mid Worcestershire from the 1997 general election to March 2015, and was MP for Worcester from 1992 until 1997. He was a Defence minister from 2010-2012.
full.title: Peter Luff
